Class Utility

java.lang.Object
  Utility

public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object

This class has a number of (mostly mathematical) utility methods to be used in other classes.

Since:
10-2-2015
Version:
2.0
Author:
Tommy Alford

gcf

public static int gcf(int a,
                      int b)
Finds the greatest common factor of two positive integers. Returns -1 if either of the integers is not positive

Parameters:
a - one of the integers
b - one of the integers
Returns:
the greatest common factor of a and b
